services.name: Kitchen Remodeling
services.description: Complete kitchen transformations from cabinets to countertops. We design and build your dream kitchen.

services.name: Bathroom Renovation
services.description: Modern bathroom upgrades including tile, vanities, showers, and full gut renovations.

services.name: Basement Finishing
services.description: Transform unused space into living areas, home theaters, offices, and more.

services.name: Interior Painting
services.description: Professional painting services with premium paints and meticulous prep work.

services.name: Flooring Installation
services.description: Hardwood, tile, luxury vinyl, and carpet installation with flawless results.

services.name: Decks & Outdoor Living
services.description: Custom decks, patios, pergolas, and outdoor kitchens built to last.

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.text: Absolutely incredible work on our kitchen remodel. They took our outdated 90s kitchen and turned it into a modern masterpiece. The team was professional, clean, and finished ahead of schedule. Could not recommend them more highly!

testimonials.name: James & Linda K.
testimonials.text: We've used them for two bathroom renovations now and both times the results exceeded our expectations. Fair pricing, excellent communication throughout the project, and the craftsmanship speaks for itself.

testimonials.name: Michael R.
testimonials.text: Had our entire basement finished and it's like we added a whole new floor to our house. The team was respectful of our home, showed up on time every day, and the quality is outstanding. Worth every penny.
